casebody.data:
ROUNDPOINT MORTGAGE SERVICING CORPORATION
v.
Leo RICHLOFF, Jr., et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 22, 2019 Jeffrey S. Richloff, self-represented, in support of the petition. Jeffrey M. Knickerbocker, in opposition.

The defendant Jeffrey S. Richloff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 42261) is denied.
